cards.name: A Fair Game
cards.text: Play: Discard the top card of your opponent’s deck and reveal their hand. You gain 1 for each card of the discarded card’s house revealed this way. Your opponent repeats the preceding effect on you.

cards.name: Annihilation Ritual
cards.text: When a creature would enter a discard pile from play, it is purged instead.

cards.name: Coup de Grâce
cards.text:
Play: Destroy each damaged creature.
Fate: Deal 4 to each friendly creature.

cards.name: Creeping Oblivion
cards.text: Play: Purge up to 2 cards from a discard pile.

cards.name: Cryptic Collapse
cards.text: Play: Discard your hand. For each card discarded this way, an enemy creature captures 1 from its own side.

cards.name: Delta P
cards.text: Play: Destroy an enemy creature. If your opponent controls more creatures than you, repeat this effect.

cards.name: Eater of the Dead
cards.text: After Fight/After Reap: Purge a creature from a discard pile. If you do, put a +1 power counter on Eater of the Dead.

cards.name: Embellish Imp
cards.text:
Each time an enemy creature is destroyed, steal 1.
Fate: Destroy the most powerful friendly creature.

cards.name: Infernal Terran
cards.text:
Play/After Reap: Discard a card. Steal 1.
Scrap: Discard your hand. Steal  equal to the number of  bonus icons on the cards discarded this way.

cards.name: Ortannu the Chained
cards.text: After Reap: Return each copy of Ortannu’s Binding from your discard pile to your hand. For each one returned this way, deal 2 to a creature, with 2 splash.

cards.name: Red-Hot Armor
cards.text: Play: Each enemy creature with armor loses all of its armor until the end of the turn and is dealt 1 for each point of armor it lost this way.

cards.name: Remmy’s Horror

cards.name: Snaglet

Elusive.

If there are no other friendly creatures in play, Solo gets +20 power and gains, “After Fight: Gain 3.“

cards.name: Soul Lock

Your opponent cannot use cards that match the house of any faceup card under Soul Lock.
Action: Discard all cards under Soul Lock. Put an enemy creature faceup under Soul Lock.

cards.name: Truebaru
cards.text:
You must lose 3 in order to play Truebaru. 
Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)
Destroyed: Gain 5.

cards.name: Atrocity
cards.text: At the start of your opponent’s turn, that player discards the top card of their deck. They must choose the discarded card’s house as their active house this turn. Deal 1 to Atrocity.

cards.name: Bloodshard Imp
cards.text: After a creature reaps, destroy it.

Play: Purge a card from your discard pile. If you do, your opponent loses 2.

You cannot forge more than 2 keys each turn.

fr.name: Le Destin se Rit de Vous

cards.name: Forge Ahead With Confidence
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent forges a key, fulfill Forge Ahead With Confidence.

es.name: Tienes la Llave de tu Futuro

cards.name: Go Forth and Conquer
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, after an enemy creature is used to fight, fulfill Go Forth and Conquer.

de.name: Mach dich auf und erobere die Welt

cards.name: Heads, I Win
cards.text:
At the end of your turn, you may flip Heads, I Win.
During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent plays a creature adjacent to a creature of the same house, fulfill Heads, I Win.

cards.name: It Only Gets Worse
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent steals one or more  from you, fulfill It Only Gets Worse.

es.name: Solo Va a Ir a Peor

cards.name: Look How Far You’ve Come
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, after they play a creature, fulfill Look How Far You've Come.

de.name: Schau, wie weit du gekommen bist

cards.name: Outlook Not So Good
cards.text: After your opponent chooses an active house that matches no cards in play, fulfill Outlook Not So Good.

cards.name: Overreach
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, after an enemy creature is used to reap, fulfill Overreach.

cards.name: Signs Point to Yes
cards.text: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if they have  in their pool equal to or greater than the current key cost, fulfill Signs Point to Yes.

cards.name: Stars Aligned
cards.text: At the start of your opponent’s turn, if each player has the same number of creatures, fulfill Stars Aligned.

cards.name: Tails, You Lose
cards.text:
At the end of your turn, you may flip Tails, You Lose.
During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent plays a creature adjacent to a creature belonging to a different house, fulfill Tails, You Lose.

cards.name: The Cards Will Tell
cards.text: During your opponent's turn, after your opponent draws a card outside of their “draw cards step”, fulfill The Cards Will Tell.

cards.name: The Early Bird
cards.text: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if they have more  in their pool than you, fulfill The Early Bird.

cards.name: The End is Nigh
cards.text: During your opponent's turn, after 3 or more creatures have been destroyed that turn, fulfill The End is Nigh.

cards.name: The Second Mouse
cards.text: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if they have less  in their pool than you, fulfill The Second Mouse.

de.name: Die Zweite Maus kriegt den Käse

cards.name: Treat Each Action as Your Last
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent plays their second action that turn, fulfill Treat Each Action as Your Last

de.name: Behandle jede Aktion wie deine Letzte

en.name: Treat Each Action as Your Last

it.name: Treat Each Action as Your Last

pl.name: Treat Each Action as Your Last

pt.name: Treat Each Action as Your Last

th.name: Treat Each Action as Your Last

cards.name: Trust Your Feelings
cards.text: When a card is placed under Trust Your Feelings, name a house. The next time your opponent chooses the named house as their active house, fulfill Trust Your Feelings.

cards.name: Wasteful Regret
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent discards a cards from their hand, fulfill Wasteful Regret.

cards.name: Wounds Into Wisdom
cards.text: During your opponent's turn, after a friendly creature is dealt damage, fulfill Wounds into Wisdom.
